ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Negotiate" stage of Opportunities in the "Recurring Business" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Recurring_Business', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Negotiate'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(GMP_Category__c,''), ISBLANK( Quotation_Issued__c), ISBLANK(Quotation_Number__c), NOT(Proposal_price_Authorized__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark 'Negotiate' stage, fill in these fields: • Quotation Issued • Quotation Number • Proposal Price Authorized • GMP Category
